document_data.name: Crimmon
document_data.mainbody: '''Crimmon''' was a male warrior who was one of the guards of the [[Twisted Tower]] in [[Shadowdale]].
document_data.History: In [[1357]], Crimmon  was involved in the hunt for [[Shandril Shessair]], guarding the tower during an infiltration attempt by the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
